name: Dont Screw It Too Much!!
description:
Special thanks to Kyrie´s for spritesheet and Black Hammer for GUI assets.

Put yourseslf in shoes of St. Peter's deputy and save the day at the gates of heaven! In our game, you have to take care of the final fate of ten people who are waiting for your verdict.
Dont screw it Up!

Github - https://github.com/Wastelander125/Dont-Screw-It-Up-Too-Much.git
